name.description: The name of your app as it will appear on the App Store

subtitle.description: A summary of your app that will appear under your app’s name on the App Store for customers with devices running iOS 11 or later

privacy-policy-url.description: A URL that links to your organization's privacy policy. Privacy policies are required for apps that are Made for Kids or offer auto-renewable or free subscriptions. They are also required for apps with account registration, apps that access a user’s existing account, or as otherwise required by law. Privacy policies are recommended for apps that collect user- or device-related data

promotional-text.description: Promotional text lets you inform your App Store visitors of any current app features without requiring an updated submission. This text will appear above your description on the App Store for customers with devices running iOS 11 or later, and macOS 10.13 or later
promotional-text.value: Absolutely anonymous. Blockchain-powered. Open Source and Trusted. Proper business solution.

keywords.Description: One or more keywords that describe your app. Keywords make App Store search results more accurate. Separate keywords with a comma
keywords.value: Blockchain, Messenger, Bitcoin, Secure, Anonymous, Business, Chat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, Skype

app-description.description: A description of your app, detailing features and functionality. It will also be used for your Apple Watch app

support-url.description: A URL with support information for your app. This URL will be visible on the App Store

marketing-url.description: A URL with marketing information about your app. This URL will be visible on the App Store

copyright.description: The name of the person or entity that owns the exclusive rights to your app, preceded by the year the rights were obtained (for example, '2008 Acme Inc.'). Do not provide a URL
